categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Sundar was a male Human Sith Lord on Korriban during the Cold War. At some point during the war, Sundar turned against the Sith Empire and took residence in the Tomb of Tulak Hord in the Valley of the Dark Lords. He and his followers were eventually eliminated by a Sith from the Academy, and his signet ring was taken from him as proof of his demise.
